channel.title: Microposts on Mila Frerichs, Data Visualization consultant for social good
channel.description: Recent content in Microposts on Mila Frerichs, Data Visualization consultant for social good

item.title: Profit first: Status report
item.description: I started implementing profit first at the beginning of the year, after I listened to the Audio book. The book got recommended by a bunch of people and I knew I wanted to get better at handling my business finances so I thought I try it out. The book was really great and there is so much truth in the way he explains the mindset most entrepreneurs have. If you don’t look at your balance sheet to make spending decisions you might want to try out this model.

item.title: Publish more
item.description: I want to publish more, but I don’t want to have it go out to the void of twitter. I found this neat idea from Justin Miller of Micro.blogs/microposts. And I will try this out. Short thoughts or ideas that would normally go to twitter or nowhere will live here.
